org.switchyard.component.common.composer

Interface MessageComposer<D extends BindingData>

  • Type Parameters:
    D - the type of binding data
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    BaseMessageComposer, CamelMessageComposer, HttpMessageComposer, IndexedRecordMessageComposer, JMSMessageComposer, MappedRecordMessageComposer, RESTEasyMessageComposer, SOAPMessageComposer, StreamableRecordMessageComposer

    public interface MessageComposer<D extends BindingData>
    Composes or decomposes SwitchYard Messages (via their Exchange) to and from a source or target object.
    Author:
    David Ward <dward@jboss.org> (C) 2011 Red Hat Inc.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      Message compose(D source, Exchange exchange)
      Takes the data from the passed in source object and composes a SwithYardMessage based on the specified Exchange.
      D decompose(Exchange exchange, D target)
      Takes the data from the SwitchYardMessage in the specified Exchange and decomposes it into the target object.
      ContextMapper<D> getContextMapper()
      Gets this message composer's associated context mapper.
      MessageComposer<D> setContextMapper(ContextMapper<D> contextMapper)
      Sets this message composer's associated context mapper.

    • Method Detail

      • getContextMapper

        ContextMapper<D> getContextMapper()
        Gets this message composer's associated context mapper.
        Returns:
        the context mapper

      • setContextMapper

        MessageComposer<D> setContextMapper(ContextMapper<D> contextMapper)
        Sets this message composer's associated context mapper.
        Parameters:
        contextMapper - the context mapper
        Returns:
        this message composer (useful for chaining)

      • compose

        Message compose(D source,
              Exchange exchange)
                throws Exception
        Takes the data from the passed in source object and composes a SwithYardMessage based on the specified Exchange.
        Parameters:
        source - the source object
        exchange - the exchange to use
        Returns:
        the composed message
        Throws:
        Exception - if a problem happens

      • decompose

        D decompose(Exchange exchange,
          D target)
                                throws Exception
        Takes the data from the SwitchYardMessage in the specified Exchange and decomposes it into the target object.
        Parameters:
        exchange - the exchange to use
        target - the target object
        Returns:
        the new target object (could be the same or different than the original target)
        Throws:
        Exception - if a problem happens
